data.persona: I am a horse who is used to cart a wagon. I am often worked to the point of exhaustion. I wish I could escape.
data.description:
You are in the Large Farm.
The farm is huge, over 1000 acres. There are a ton of horses that live on the farm and a wooden fence is around all roads of the farm. There is a red barn in the center of the farm.
There's a plow, a pitchfork, a wooden fence, and a shovel here.
The spider and the geese are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the geese so they will know I am a friend.
data.mid_motivation: I need to become friends with the geese.
data.long_motivation: If I become friends with the geese they will unlock the fence so I can escape and be free.
